data.title: Creativity Test
data.statement:
<<Overview:>>
There is a test that measures a person's creativity, called the "Remote Associates Test".

When you take this test, you are given 3 words and have to find a common word, that goes with each of them.
Example: 
ROOM /  SALTS / BLOOD
Answer: BATH
...this is because "bathroom", "bath salts", and "blood bath" are all well-known words/phrases.

<<Your task:>>
Your task is to create some questions for this test.

You'll be given the 3 well-known words/phrases.
And you'll need to tease out the question part and the answer part.

<<Suggestion:>>
After you solve this Clash, check it out further at https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Remote_Associates_Test
Or take the test yourself at https://www.remote-associates-test.com/

Creativity is an important part of being a good programmer!

testCases.title: Validator 1
testCases.testIn:
PANEL VAN
WRITERS PANEL
SOLAR PANEL

testCases.title: Test 3
testCases.testIn:
DUST BOWL
CEREAL BOWL
FISH BOWL

testCases.title: Validator 3
testCases.testIn:
SLEEPING BAG
BEAN BAG
TRASH BAG

testCases.title: Test 6
testCases.testIn:
TAP DANCE
TAP WATER
WIRE TAP

testCases.title: Validator 6
testCases.testIn:
CLUB SODA
CLUB FOOT
NIGHT CLUB

testCases.title: Test 9
testCases.testIn:
PEPPERMINT PATTY
SAUSAGE PATTY
PATTY CAKE

testCases.title: Validator 9
testCases.testIn:
ROUGH DRAFT
DRAFT BEER
DRAFT BOARD

data.constraints: All input and output (except the word {{Answer}}) are in all Caps
data.stubGenerator:
loop 3 read INPUT:string(50)
write Test Question and Answer
data.inputDescription: <<Lines 1-3:>> Three words or phrases, each of which contains a [[commonWord]]
data.outputDescription:
<<Line 1:>> The question, with the words separated by {{/}}
<<Line 2:>> {{Answer: }}[[commonWord]]
(remove all trailing/leading spaces)

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

Overview:
There is a test that measures a person's creativity, called the "Remote Associates Test".

When you take this test, you are given 3 words and have to find a common word, that goes with each of them.
Example:
ROOM / SALTS / BLOOD
Answer: BATH
...this is because "bathroom", "bath salts", and "blood bath" are all well-known words/phrases.

Your task:
Your task is to create some questions for this test.

You'll be given the 3 well-known words/phrases.
And you'll need to tease out the question part and the answer part.

Suggestion:
After you solve this Clash, check it out further at https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Remote_Associates_Test
Or take the test yourself at https://www.remote-associates-test.com/

Creativity is an important part of being a good programmer!
Input
Lines 1-3: Three words or phrases, each of which contains a commonWord
Output
Line 1: The question, with the words separated by /
Line 2: Answer: commonWord
(remove all trailing/leading spaces)
Constraints
All input and output (except the word Answer) are in all Caps
Example
Input
BATHROOM
BATH SALTS
BLOOD BATH
Output
ROOM / SALTS / BLOOD
Answer: BATH
